description.fr:
{%FightTurnStarted} Gagne {PropertyEffect:14} pour le tour si un autre allié est en jeu.\vPuis Inflige {magicalDamage:d} au personnage adverse avec le plus de {%PV} si {Summoning:1440} possède {ATvalue:p} ou plus.
\---
Lorsqu'un allié meurt : {ATvalue:v,percent,+}.
\---
{%Death} Ressuscite avec toute sa {%PVMAX}.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStarted} Gains {PropertyEffect:14} for the turn if another ally is in play.\vThen inflicts {magicalDamage:d} on the opposing character with the most {%PV} if {Summoning:1440} has {ATvalue:p} or more.
\---
When an ally dies: {ATvalue:v,percent,+}.
\---
{%Death} Revives with all her {%PVMAX}.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStarted} Gana {PropertyEffect:14} durante el turno si otro aliado está en juego.\vLuego inflige {magicalDamage:d} al personaje contrario con más {%PV} si {Summoning:1440} posee {ATvalue:p} o más.
\---
Cuando un aliado muere: {ATvalue:v,percent,+}.
\---
{%Death} Resucita con toda su {%PVMAX}.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStarted} Wird {PropertyEffect:14} für die Runde, wenn ein anderer Verbündeter im Spiel ist.\vVerursacht dann beim gegnerischen Charakter mit den meisten {%PV} {magicalDamage:d}, solange {Summoning:1440} mindestens {ATvalue:p} besitzt.
\---
Wenn ein Verbündeter stirbt: {ATvalue:v,percent,+}.
\---
{%Death} Wird mit vollen {%PVMAX} wiederbelebt.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStarted} Ganha {PropertyEffect:14} durante o turno se houver outro aliado no jogo.\vDepois, inflige {magicalDamage:d} ao personagem adversário com mais {%PV} se {Summoning:1440} possuir {ATvalue:p} ou mais.
\---
Quando um aliado morre: {ATvalue:v,percent,+}.
\---
{%Death} Ressuscita com toda a sua {%PVMAX}.
